description: This file contains CSS styles defining the theme management for a simple to-do list application, including light and dark themes with several CSS variables for colors and styles.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for centering content and responsive background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled for layout and responsive design.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo container with animation effects when preferred motion is not reduced.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Stylized link element with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with hover and active effects.
